name: tugboat
description: A node.js agent for managing remote Docker containers.

scripts.docker:run: docker stop tugboat && docker rm tugboat && docker run --name tugboat --env-file ./tugboat/.env -p 7567:7567 -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v //./pipe/docker_engine://./pipe/docker_engine -v "/tugboat:/tugboat" tugboat:latest
